con:parameter.con:name: title
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series matching the specified title.

con:parameter.con:name: titleStartsWith
con:parameter.con:description: Return series with titles that begin with the specified string (e.g. Sp).

con:parameter.con:name: startYear
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series matching the specified start year.

con:parameter.con:name: modifiedSince
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series which have been modified since the specified date.

con:parameter.con:name: comics
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series which contain the specified comics (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: stories
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series which contain the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: events
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series which have comics that take place during the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: creators
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series which feature work by the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: characters
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series which feature the specified characters (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: seriesType
con:parameter.con:description: Filter the series by publication frequency type.

con:parameter.con:name: contains
con:parameter.con:description: Return only series containing one or more comics with the specified format.

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

con:parameter.con:name: offset
con:parameter.con:description: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: Too many values sent to a multi-value list filter.
